DOC.criteria: Healthy woman undergo IVF CRMI Age ≤ 38 year Poor ovarian reserve antral follicle count le 6 follicle , cycle day 2/3 FSH > 12 ng/ml , AMH < 0.5 ng/ml Healthy woman undergo IVF male factor , severe endometriosis , tubal factor infertility Donor patient Contraindications use gonadotropin ( i.e . pregnancy , lactation , undiagnosed vaginal bleeding ovarian cyst ) Recent current medical condition patient medically stable undergo stimulation egg retrieval , HIV infection , diabetes , cardiovascular disease , gastrointestinal , hepatic disease , renal pulmonary disease .
